verses.verse: The priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> all the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> shall have no portion <S%H2506><s%> nor inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with Israel: <S%H3478><s%> they shall eat <S%H398><s%> the offerings <S%H801><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> made by fire, <S%H801><s%> and his inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
They shall have no inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> their brothers: <S%H251><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is their inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> as he has spoken to them. <S%H1696><s%>

This shall be the priests <S%H3548><s%>' due <S%H4941><s%> from the people, <S%H5971><s%> from those who offer <S%H2076><s%> a sacrifice, <S%H2077><s%> whether it be ox <S%H7794><s%> or sheep, <S%H7716><s%> that they shall give <S%H5414><s%> to the priest <S%H3548><s%> the shoulder, <S%H2220><s%> and the two cheeks, <S%H3895><s%> and the maw. <S%H6896><s%>

The first fruits <S%H7225><s%> of your grain, <S%H1715><s%> of your new wine, <S%H8492><s%> and of your oil, <S%H3323><s%> and the first <S%H7225><s%> of the fleece <S%H1488><s%> of your sheep, <S%H6629><s%> you shall give him. <S%H5414><s%>

For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> him out of all your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> him and his sons <S%H1121><s%> for ever. <S%H3117><s%>

If a Levite <S%H3881><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> from any <S%H259><s%> of your gates <S%H8179><s%> out of all Israel, <S%H3478><s%> where he lives <S%H1481><s%> as a foreigner, <S%H935><s%> and comes with all the desire <S%H185><s%> of his soul <S%H5315><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall choose; <S%H977><s%>

then he shall minister <S%H8334><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> his God, <S%H430><s%> as all his brothers <S%H251><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> do, <S%H5975><s%> who stand there before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
They shall have like portions <S%H2506><s%> to eat, <S%H398><s%> besides that which comes of the sale <S%H4465><s%> of his patrimony. <S%H1><s%>

When you have come <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you, <S%H3925><s%> you shall not learn to do <S%H6213><s%> after the abominations <S%H8441><s%> of those nations. <S%H1471><s%>

There shall not be found <S%H4672><s%> with you anyone who makes his son <S%H1121><s%> or his daughter <S%H1323><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> through the fire, <S%H784><s%> one who uses <S%H7080><s%> divination, <S%H7081><s%> one who practices sorcery, <S%H6049><s%> or an enchanter, <S%H5172><s%> or a sorcerer, <S%H3784><s%>
or a charmer, <S%H2266><s%> or a consulter <S%H7592><s%> with a familiar spirit, <S%H178><s%> or a wizard, <S%H3049><s%> or a necromancer. <S%H1875><s%>

For whoever does <S%H6213><s%> these things is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> and because <S%H1558><s%> of these abominations <S%H8441><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> does drive them out <S%H3423><s%> from before you. <S%H6440><s%>
You shall be perfect <S%H8549><s%> with Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

For these nations, <S%H1471><s%> that you shall dispossess, <S%H3423><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to those who practice sorcery, <S%H6049><s%> and to diviners; <S%H7080><s%> but as for you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh your God <S%H430><s%> has not allowed you so to do. <S%H5414><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will raise up <S%H6965><s%> to you a prophet <S%H5030><s%> from the midst <S%H7130><s%> of you, <S%H251><s%> of your brothers, like me. <S%H8085><s%> You shall listen to him.

This is according to all that you desired <S%H7592><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in Horeb <S%H2722><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the assembly, <S%H6951><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Let me not hear <S%H8085><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> neither let me see <S%H7200><s%> this great <S%H1419><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> any more, <S%H4191><s%> that I not die."
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H3190><s%> "They have well said that which they have spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

I will raise them up <S%H6965><s%> a prophet <S%H5030><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> their brothers, <S%H251><s%> like you; <S%H5414><s%> and I will put my words <S%H1697><s%> in his mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and he shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to them all that I shall command him. <S%H6680><s%>
It shall happen, <S%H376><s%> that whoever will not listen <S%H8085><s%> to my words <S%H1697><s%> which he shall speak <S%H1696><s%> in my name, <S%H8034><s%> I will require it of him. <S%H1875><s%>

But the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> who shall speak <S%H1696><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> presumptuously <S%H2102><s%> in my name, <S%H8034><s%> which I have not commanded <S%H6680><s%> him to speak, <S%H1696><s%> or who shall speak <S%H1696><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> that same prophet <S%H5030><s%> shall die. <S%H4191><s%>"
If you say <S%H559><s%> in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> "How shall we know <S%H3045><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has not spoken? <S%H1696><s%>"

when a prophet <S%H5030><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> if the thing <S%H1697><s%> doesn't <S%H935><s%> follow, nor happen, that is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has not spoken: <S%H1696><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> it presumptuously, <S%H2087><s%> you shall not be afraid of him. <S%H1481><s%>
